column2: Start a process of reformation of the faith within your realm.

A reformation of the ancient Slavic faith has been initiated by [Root.GetTitledName], who wishes to strengthen it and make it resistant to other, more proselytising faiths. Within [Root.GetHerHis] realm, priests and wise men have started creating a holy book which will be used to teach the common folk of faith and piety. This new reformation also brings a new position - the Velikâjî Volhv, lord spiritual of all Slavs. [Root.GetTitledName] calls upon all who follow the Slavic beliefs to join [Root.GetHerHim] in spreading this newly reformed faith!
Start a process of reformation of the faith within your realm.

A reformation of the ancient Baltic faith has been initiated by [Root.GetTitledName], who wishes to strengthen it and make it resistant to other, more proselytising faiths. Within [Root.GetHerHis] realm, priests and wise men have started creating a holy book which will be used to teach the common folk of faith and piety. This new reformation also brings a new position - the Krivis Kriviu, lord spiritual of all Balts. [Root.GetTitledName] calls upon all who follow the Baltic beliefs to join [Root.GetHerHim] in spreading this newly reformed faith!
Start a process of reformation of the faith within your realm.

A reformation of the ancient Sámi faith has been initiated by [Root.GetTitledName], who wishes to strengthen it and make it resistant to other, more proselytising faiths. Within [Root.GetHerHis] realm, priests and wise men have started creating a holy book which will be used to teach the common folk of faith and piety. This new reformation also brings a new position - the Noajddej Noajdde, lord spiritual of all Sámi. [Root.GetTitledName] calls upon all who follow the Sámi beliefs to join [Root.GetHerHim] in spreading this newly reformed faith!
Start a process of reformation of the faith within your realm.

A reformation of the ancient Hungarian faith has been initiated by [Root.GetTitledName], who wishes to strengthen it and make it resistant to other, more proselytising faiths. Within [Root.GetHerHis] realm, priests and wise men have started creating a holy book which will be used to teach the common folk of faith and piety. This new reformation also brings a new position - the Táltos Táltosoknak, lord spiritual of all Hungarians. [Root.GetTitledName] calls upon all who follow the Hungarian beliefs to join [Root.GetHerHim] in spreading this newly reformed faith!
The old ways are still best!
